references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concepts and framework that many other TS diffusion models build upon.

references.paper_title: Predict, refine, synthesize: Self-guiding diffusion models for probabilistic time series forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces TSDiff, a state-of-the-art unconditional TS diffusion model that serves as a key baseline model in the current work.

references.paper_title: DeepAR: Probabilistic forecasting with autoregressive recurrent networks
references.reason: DeepAR is a widely used and highly effective baseline forecasting model used for comparison in this paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Temporal fusion transformers for interpretable multi-horizon time series forecasting
references.reason: TFT is a strong baseline forecasting method, frequently used as a comparison to highlight the improvements made by diffusion models for time series.

references.paper_title: CSDI: Conditional score-based diffusion models for probabilistic time series imputation
references.reason: CSDI is another important conditional diffusion model for time series which this work extends to show improvement with their adaptive noise schedule.
